author: matejdro

changelog.release_notes: Dialer now respects watch quiet time.
Fixed SMS writing on classic Pebble watches
Fixed several issues that arose with 3.0 release.

- Pebble OS 4: Added app icon
- Pebble OS 4: App will now always exit to the watchwace instead of to menu occasionaly (when close to last app is off)
- Added loading animation
- Trying to open watchapp when phone is disconnected will show an error
- Attempt to improve "Loading..." error behavior.
- Finally supports answering on Samsung devices without root
- Phone app UI overhaul
- Faster caller image loading
- Caller image now fills the whole screen
- Caller image is now darkened with solid white text in front. Should improve text readability.
- Added option to disable call timer
- Added option to move caller's name to the bottom when image is displayed
- Added volume up/down actions
- Added quiet timer
- Added do not interrupt respecting
- Added vibration pattern settings
- Green phone app icon
- Misc fixes﻿
Fixed glitchy call history UI, fixed written SMS sometimes failing.
Crash fixes, Improved support for 3.x on classic Pebble, removed support for 2.x firmwares.
Now it actually shows caller's name.

- Pebble Time Round support
- Added option to change fonts on call window
- Android 6 permission system
- Fixed bug where Pebble kept vibrating when muted with root mode
Fixed occasional weird button behavior on number picker window.

- Added ability to send SMS to any contact

- Fixed close to last app on Pebble Time

- Added option to disable incoming and/or outgoing call popup

- Added changing settings via Tasker

- Added option to not vibrate while charging

- Fixed timer being stuck on 99 minutes

- Improved text reability in front of picture
- Fixed caller number not being displayed in the center when caller is not in contacts.
- Fixed close to last app on classic Pebble
Fixed call window crash when number is not in the contacts.

- Renamed application to "Dialer for Pebble" (Requested by Pebble team due to trademark)
- Added displaying caller image on Pebble Time
- Fixed call window statusbar on Pebble Time
- Fixed mute ringer on Lollipop

- Bumped SDK to 3.0
- Colorful menu selector on PT
- Colorful answer and decline icons on PT

- Added Decline with SMS (mapped to holding DOWN button by default)
- Added option to turn light on when call comes

- Performance and reliability improvements
- Support for multiple Google accounts
- Added option to remap incoming call buttons
- Added "Answer and put on speakerphone" action
- Long names now display in two lines

description: Answer, decline, mute, make calls from your Pebble.

latest_release.release_notes: Dialer now respects watch quiet time.

title: Dialer for Pebble
